TopicTitle: [WIP][1.9.x-1.12.x] Scatterer-atmospheric scattering (0.0838 - 14/08/2022) Scattering improvements, in-game atmo generation and multi-sun support

Hello. After installing the new dll, scatterer no longer works at all for me. Did I mess up somehow? I only copied the new dll, so maybe I missed that it also expects something else.

![screenshot16.png](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/19231999/posted/screenshot16.png)

I'd just been using the default settings with the only problems I could really tell being that bar and the OceanLights causing framerate drops (as it says on the menu). ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

I'll switch back to the previous dll version for now if you would probably recommend that. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
